headline: FirstEnergy Corp (NYSE:FE) Reports Strong Q4 2025 Revenue Beat and Affirms 2026 Outlook
summary: FirstEnergy's Q4 2025 results featured a major revenue beat, with full-year core EPS at the high end of guidance. The company affirmed its 2026 outlook, signaling steady, predictable growth.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy Corp (NYSE:FE) Reports Strong Q4 2025 Revenue Beat and Affirms 2026 Outlook
raw.summary: FirstEnergy's Q4 2025 results featured a major revenue beat, with full-year core EPS at the high end of guidance. The company affirmed its 2026 outlook, signaling steady, predictable growth.

headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.92% and +16.94%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
raw.summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.92% and +16.94%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: FirstEnergy: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Akron, Ohio-based company said it had a loss of 8 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to 53 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Akron, Ohio-based company said it had a loss of 8 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to 53 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: FirstEnergy Announces 2025 Financial Results, Affirms 2026 Guidance and Provides Long-Term Financial Outlook Focused on Delivering Value to Customers, Communities and Investors
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today reported 2025 GAAP earnings of $1.02 billion, or $1.77 per basic share ($1.76 diluted), on revenue of $15.1 billion. These results include the impact of Ohio regulatory orders in the fourth quarter of 2025. In 2024, the company reported GAAP earnings of $978 million, or $1.70 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $13.5 billion. GAAP results for both periods reflect the impact of additional special items listed below.

In 2024, the company reported GAAP earnings of $978 million, or $1.70 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $13.5 billion. GAAP results for both periods reflect the impact of additional special items listed below.

headline: FirstEnergy Ohio Utilities’ PIPP RFP Auction: Information Session for Prospective Bidders on Wednesday, February 18, 2026
summary: BOSTON, February 17, 2026--CRA International, Inc. (NASDAQ: CRAI), a worldwide leader in providing economic, financial, and management consulting services, today announced that an RFP auction process will be conducted for FirstEnergy Corp.’s (NYSE: FE) Ohio subsidiaries – Ohio Edison, The Illuminating Company and Toledo Edison – to procure full requirements service for their Percentage of Income Payment Plan (PIPP) customers.
